posts.post_title: FS/ T206 Al Burch (batting) SGC 80, Tough common $285
posts.post_content: Another difficult common in high grade, very well centered with a clean Pied 150 reverse, please send me your email for scans. $285 delivered....thanks
$525 for Powers and Burch, that's an absolute steal....
